meanings.definition: To reverse the effects of something
meanings.sent1: She undoes her mistake by apologizing sincerely.
meanings.sent2: He undoes the knot to release the rope.
meanings.sent3: The magician undoes the disappearing act by revealing the hidden compartment.
meanings.sent4: Time undoes all wounds, healing even the deepest scars.
meanings.sent5: The undo button on the computer undoes any changes made.

meanings.sent1: He carefully undoes the shoelaces before putting on new shoes.
meanings.sent2: She undoes the ribbon to reveal the surprise gift inside.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully undoes the yarn ball, creating a mess in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The gentle breeze undoes the tightly knotted hair, letting it flow freely.
meanings.sent5: The chef undoes the apron after a long day in the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The judge undoes the previous ruling after new evidence is presented.
meanings.sent2: They quickly undoes the subscription to avoid further charges.
meanings.sent3: The rain undoes the outdoor plans for the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The apology undoes the tension between the friends, restoring their bond.
meanings.sent5: The eraser undoes the pencil marks on the paper.
